allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Next.js 16 async params compatibility for route handlers

Update all dynamic route handlers to use async params syntax required by Next.js 16.
Changed params from synchronous object to Promise that must be awaited.

- Updated action-items route handlers \(GET, PATCH, DELETE\)
- Updated notes routes \(mindmap, project-brief, related, reprocess, research\)
- Updated notes search route
- Updated notes/[id] page component

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Complete database migration from Supabase to PostgreSQL

This commit finalizes the migration away from Supabase to direct PostgreSQL:
- Refactored auth server to wrap user in object for consistency
- Updated all components to handle new auth response format
- Cleaned up database query error handling
- Added deployment status tracking
- Updated TypeScript config to exclude scripts folder
- Added Supabase types file for backward compatibility

All database queries now use direct PostgreSQL through the db query interface.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
